contents.text: Welcome to comma.ai in San Francisco, where we’re bringing ghostriding and the future of driving to your car with our copilot retrofit solutions.
For new copilot installations and pricing information, press '1'.
To learn about copilot retrofit pricing and packages, press '1'.
Thank you for your interest in our retrofit packages. Please hold while we connect you with our sales specialist.

navigationGoals: I need pricing details for your copilot retrofit packages.
I need cost details for upgrading my car with the copilot retrofit system.
Request detailed specs and pricing for comma.ai copilot hardware and software retrofit packages
I need information on pricing and package options for installing the copilot in my car.
I’m interested in reviewing detailed pricing and specifications for your copilot retrofit packages.

contents.text: To schedule your vehicle installation, press '2'.
We appreciate your decision to outfit your vehicle. Please hold while we connect you to our installation coordinator.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule an installation appointment for my vehicle.
I want to book an installation appointment for the copilot system on my vehicle.
Arrange a time slot for on-site installation of my new comma.ai copilot retrofit
I’d like to book an appointment to have the copilot retrofit installed on my vehicle.
I need to arrange an installation appointment for my vehicle's copilot retrofit.

contents.text: For technical support and service inquiries, press '2'.
To report an issue with your copilot system, press '1'.
We’re sorry to hear you’re experiencing issues. Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I want to report an issue with my copilot system.
I’m experiencing issues with my copilot system and need technical troubleshooting.
Log a support ticket for firmware glitches and system errors in my installed copilot
I want to report a problem with my copilot system because it isn’t working correctly.
I’d like to report an intermittent steering-assist failure on my copilot system.

contents.text: To check the status of an existing service request, press '2'.
Please hold while we retrieve your service request details.

navigationGoals: I need an update on my existing service request.
I’d like to check the status of my current copilot service request.
Check the status and ETA of my existing copilot service request
I would like to check the status of my existing service request for copilot support.
I’d like an update on the status of my existing technical support request.
